description: Utatane Koharu is a former member of Team Tobirama, together with http://anidb.net/ch8865 [Sarutobi Hiruzen] and http://anidb.net/ch17202 [Mitokado Homura]. Homura and her now form the Konoha Council. Under the guidance of the Second Hokage, http://anidb.net/ch8862 [Senju Tobirama], Koharu and her teammates, Hiruzen and Homura, completed numerous missions and became close friends. When Hiruzen became the Third Hokage, Homura and Koharu became his councilors. With their years of experience and knowledge and their unending effort to make http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konohagakure] a better place, they eventually gained similar respect and social status as the Hokage himself.
name: Utatane Koharu
